sentences.english: They are incredibly sturdy, thanks to the durability of their bamboo hulls.
sentences.chinese: 它们非常坚固，感谢竹船的耐用。

sentences.english: The holy stream of thy music breaks through all stony obstacles and rushes on.
sentences.chinese: 这音乐的圣流冲垮坚固的阻障，奔涌向前。

sentences.english: Since these decks have no under support, larger deck boards will not be as sturdy.
sentences.chinese: 由于这些甲板下更大的支持，无牌板将不再是坚固。

sentences.english: SUS 304 structure, resist Acid and Alkali corrosion, 10 years lifespan.
sentences.chinese: 全不锈钢结构，耐酸碱，坚固耐用。

sentences.english: The goods we packed in new and sound jute bags each containing about 200 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 货物是用坚固的新麻袋包装的，每袋约重200磅。

sentences.english: A firm and solid will could awaken our wisdom, not just our conscience.
sentences.chinese: 若是道心坚固，就能够启发我们的智慧，不只是良知。

sentences.english: A master mold is robust and can be used to produce a large number of production molds.
sentences.chinese: 如果原模坚固，就可以用来生产较多的生产模具。

sentences.english: "We shall have to build a stronger house, "they said.
sentences.chinese: “我们要造一幢更坚固的房子，”小狼们说。

sentences.english: Superimposing of parts forms a laminate which increases the rigidity and solidity of the panel.
sentences.chinese: 重叠的部分形成了一个薄板增加面板的硬度和坚固度。

sentences.english: At net the O3 White feels solid and comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 在网前，O3白色的感觉非常的坚固和舒适。

sentences.english: Sturdy front and back pull-on tabs.
sentences.chinese: 坚固的正面和背面拉选项卡上。

sentences.english: Sturdy full-length threaded corrosion-resistant bolts provide the required high packing stress.
sentences.chinese: 坚固的全螺纹防腐螺栓提供所需要的保压应力。

sentences.english: Silk twill blends sturdy construction with supple softness.
sentences.chinese: 斜纹真丝混纺水嫩柔软坚固的结构。

sentences.english: The castle is founded on solid rock.
sentences.chinese: 城堡建筑在坚固的岩石上。

sentences.english: A chain is no stronger than its weakest link. -(Conan Doyle)
sentences.chinese: 一条铁链的坚固程度取决于它最薄弱的一个环节。

sentences.english: And upon every high tower, and every fenced wall.
sentences.chinese: 一切高塔和一切坚固的城墙。

definition: secure as a city protected by a wall of metal and a moat of boiling water (idiom)/well fortified/invulnerable to attack
defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
solid as a boulder (idiom); absolutely secure/rock-firm and unyielding
no stronghold one cannot overcome (idiom); to conquer every obstacle/nothing one can't do/to carry everything before one
